alert.note: Alert for Greene; Lenoir (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 9:22AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Greene and northern Lenoir Counties through 945 AM EDT... At 921 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Elm City to 9 miles east of Fremont to near Goldsboro. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kinston, La Grange, Snow Hill, Dawson, Maury, Institute, Jason, Lizzie, Kinston Regional Jetport, Hookerton, Castoria, Shine, Fort Run VFD, Bull Head VFD and Walstonburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
